actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Isle Royale National Park, Mich., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Isle Royale National Park in Michigan as wilderness. States that the wilderness areas designated by this Act shall be known as the Isle Royale Wilderness and shall be administered by the Secretary of the Interior in accordance with specified provisions of the Wilderness Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Isle Royale National Park, Mich., as wilderness.
